author: Jeremy R
title: The only place to stay while in NYC!
text:
Cambria hotel & suites New York in Chelsea is everything you would want in a hotel while staying in NYC. First, check-in is always a breeze and the front desk staff is welcoming and friendly. They always try to give you the best room they can when you arrive. They offer rooms with two queen beds, which is a rarity in NYC. This last time I stayed my room was huge and had a wonderful view of the city. The room has a ton of plug-ins for your computer, phone and gadgets. The room has a microwave and a refrigerator. I'm a hot sleeper so good air-conditions is important. The AC in the rooms is the best I've ever seen. The TV is huge and viewing quality is perfect. My one complaint about the room is the size of the bathroom. It's very small with barely enough room to move around in. But the size of the room makes up for it. There is a great place to eat in the hotel that is affordable and the food is delicious. The elevators are super fast, which when you are on the 18th floor, is a big deal. The location of the hotel couldn't be better. It's close to Penn Station, Macy's and Times Square. The price is pretty fair for what you get in this hotel. I can't imagine staying anywhere else.
